titles.title: Health Savings Account Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the maximum contribution limit for health savings accounts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
2/27/2015--Introduced. Health Savings Account Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the maximum amount that an individual participating in a health savings account may contribute to such an account to match the amount of the deductible and out-of-pocket expenses that such individual pays under a high deductible health plan.
